name: Lanes Of Conquest
description:
The game mechanic is inspired from Age of war but you have an additional dimension ! 

You can change your point of view to strategically take the upper hand upon your enemy.

Keys:

Space: switch view mode
up-down arrow keys: switch the lane where you spawn your units
right-left arrow keys: move the camera
Q-W-E-R: Spawn units (see the GUI)
P: reload the current level

Repository sources (licenses in the readme):
https://github.com/alelievr/MixAndGameJam_2019
